Tooltip: This activity creates a new folder inside a specified folder in Orchestrator. If no folder is specified, the new folder will be created at the top level in Orchestrator

Arguments.Name: FolderDescription
Arguments.Tooltip: Description for the folder to be created

Arguments.Name: FolderName
Arguments.Tooltip: Name for the folder to be created

Arguments.Name: ParentFolder
Arguments.Tooltip: The destination folder in which the new folder will be created. If not specified, the new folder will be created at the top level in Orchestrator.
